---
title: "Solutions for AOC 2020"
description: |
  My first Advent of Code!
---

```{r include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```
```{r results = 'asis', echo = FALSE}
available_rmds <- list.files(here::here("2020"),full.names = TRUE,pattern = "Rmd$")

day <- seq_along(available_rmds)

headings <- paste("## Day", day)
url_links <- paste0("<https://adventofcode.com/2020/day/",day,">")

pages <- available_rmds |> 
  purrr::map(knitr::knit_child, envir = environment(), quiet = TRUE)

for(i in seq_along(available_rmds)){
  cat(headings[[i]])
  cat("\n")
  cat(url_links[[i]])
  cat("\n")
  cat(pages[[i]])
  cat("\n")
}
```
